meanings.sent1: The doughty knight fearlessly faced the dragon.
meanings.sent2: She admired the doughty soldier's courage in battle.
meanings.sent3: The doughty squirrel bravely defended its acorn stash from the other animals.
meanings.sent4: His doughty spirit shone through even in the darkest of times.
meanings.sent5: The doughty firefighter rushed into the burning building to save the trapped family.

meanings.sent1: The doughty oak tree stood tall against the storm.
meanings.sent2: The old castle walls were built to be doughty and impenetrable.
meanings.sent3: The doughty rope held firm as they crossed the chasm.
meanings.sent4: Her doughty resolve never wavered, no matter the challenge.
meanings.sent5: The doughty ship weathered the rough seas without faltering.

meanings.sent1: With a doughty heart, she stood up to the bully.
meanings.sent2: The doughty explorer ventured into the unknown jungle.
meanings.sent3: The doughty cat fearlessly chased away the larger dog.
meanings.sent4: In the face of danger, his doughty spirit never faltered.
meanings.sent5: The doughty leader inspired his followers with his fearless actions.
